description.en: A vital spice in Southeast Asian cuisine, our candlenuts are sourced from local farmers and processed with strict quality control for culinary and industrial uses.
description.id: Rempah penting dalam masakan Asia Tenggara. Kemiri kami dikeringkan dan diproses dengan kontrol mutu yang ketat.

description.en: Eco-friendly and efficient, our coconut-shell charcoal briquettes are ideal for BBQ and industrial applications.
description.id: Briket arang dari tempurung kelapa ini ramah lingkungan dan ideal untuk keperluan BBQ atau industri.

description.en: We provide healthy, high-quality lobster seeds sourced from certified aquaculture partners for sustainable marine farming.
description.id: Benur lobster berkualitas tinggi untuk budidaya laut yang berkelanjutan, dikirim hidup dan bersertifikasi.

description.en: Fresh banana leaves are ideal for food packaging and cultural purposes. We deliver them in clean, layered condition for various international uses.
description.id: Daun pisang segar, bersih, cocok untuk pengemasan makanan dan acara budaya.
